Package com.tumblr.backboard.imitator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConstrainedMotionImitator
    Constrains the motion between the minimum and maximum values.
    EventImitator
    Maps a MotionEvent to a Spring, although it does not pick a property to map.
    Imitator
    Perturbs a Spring based on some other source.
    InertialImitator
    A ConstrainedMotionImitator that moves freely when the user is not dragging it.
    MotionImitator
    Maps a user's motion to a View via a Spring.
    SpringImitator
    Allows a Spring to imitate another Spring.
    ToggleImitator
    Toggle between two Spring states depending on whether or not the user is touching the screen.
